title: PAD-US 4.1 Fee - Fee-Owned Protected Areas
description: Fee-owned protected areas from PAD-US 4.1, containing 296,456 features where land is directly owned (fee simple title) by federal, state, local, tribal, or private conservation entities. This is the largest and most commonly used PAD-US layer, covering lands such as National Parks, National Forests, state parks, and private conservation lands. Managed by USGS Gap Analysis Project (GAP). Indexed by H3 hexagons at resolution 10 (~15m² cells).
license_other: Public Domain (U.S. Government Work) - Not subject to copyright protection within the United States (17 U.S.C. § 105). International rights may apply.

links.title: Detailed Data Documentation and Usage Examples

geoparquet.title: GeoParquet file with 296,456 fee-owned protected areas
geoparquet.description: Cloud-native GeoParquet format optimized for analytical queries. Use with DuckDB, Polars, pandas, or any GeoParquet-compatible tool. Geometries in EPSG:4326.

pmtiles.title: PMTiles for web mapping
pmtiles.description: Pyramid of map tiles in PMTiles format. Supports zoom levels 0-14 for efficient web map rendering.

h3-parquet.title: H3 hex-indexed parquet files
h3-parquet.description: Parquet files partitioned by H3 cell at resolution 10 (~15m²). Partitioned by h0 for efficient spatial queries. Each row contains a protected area feature with its intersecting H3 cell.

table:columns.name: _cng_fid
table:columns.description: Cloud-native geometry feature ID. Unique identifier for each protected area feature.

table:columns.name: FeatClass
table:columns.description: Feature class. Always 'Fee' for this layer, indicating fee simple ownership.

table:columns.name: Category
table:columns.description: GAP stewardship category: 'Federal Land', 'State Land', 'Local Land', 'Private Conservation Land', 'Joint Ownership', or 'Designation Area'.

table:columns.name: Own_Type
table:columns.description: Owner type code: FED (Federal), STAT (State), LOC (Local), PVT (Private), JNT (Joint), TRIB (Tribal), TERR (Territorial), DIST (District), NGO (Non-Governmental Organization).

table:columns.name: Own_Name
table:columns.description: Owner name. Specific agency or entity that holds legal title to the protected area.

table:columns.name: Loc_Own
table:columns.description: Local owner name. Owner name in local terminology when different from Own_Name.

table:columns.name: Mang_Type
table:columns.description: Manager type code. Same codes as Own_Type. Indicates the type of entity responsible for day-to-day management.

table:columns.name: Mang_Name
table:columns.description: Manager name. Agency or organization responsible for day-to-day management.

table:columns.name: Loc_Mang
table:columns.description: Local manager name. Manager name in local terminology when different from Mang_Name.

table:columns.name: Des_Tp
table:columns.description: Designation type code (e.g., 'NP' for National Park, 'NWR' for National Wildlife Refuge, 'WILD' for Wilderness).

table:columns.name: Loc_Ds
table:columns.description: Local designation. Official designation name in original language or local terminology.

table:columns.name: Unit_Nm
table:columns.description: Unit name. Official name of the protected area.

table:columns.name: Loc_Nm
table:columns.description: Local name. Alternative or historical name for the protected area.

table:columns.name: State_Nm
table:columns.description: State name. Two-letter postal abbreviation of the U.S. state or territory.

table:columns.name: Agg_Src
table:columns.description: Aggregator source. Organization that compiled the data into PAD-US.

table:columns.name: GIS_Src
table:columns.description: GIS source. Original GIS data provider or source dataset name.

table:columns.name: Src_Date
table:columns.description: Source date in YYYYMMDD or YYYY format.

table:columns.name: GIS_Acres
table:columns.description: GIS-calculated area in acres. Most reliable area measure, calculated from the geometry.

table:columns.name: Source_PAID
table:columns.description: Source Protected Area ID from the source agency's dataset.

table:columns.name: WDPA_Cd
table:columns.description: World Database on Protected Areas site code. Null for sites not in WDPA.

table:columns.name: Pub_Access
table:columns.description: Public access code: OA (Open Access), RA (Restricted Access), XA (Closed), UK (Unknown).

table:columns.name: Access_Src
table:columns.description: Source of the public access information.

table:columns.name: Access_Dt
table:columns.description: Date the public access status was determined in YYYYMMDD or YYYY format.

table:columns.name: GAP_Sts
table:columns.description: GAP Status Code: '1'=Permanent biodiversity primary goal; '2'=Permanent biodiversity primary/major goal; '3'=Permanent multiple uses; '4'=No known biodiversity mandate.

table:columns.name: GAPCdSrc
table:columns.description: Source document used to assign the GAP Status Code.

table:columns.name: GAPCdDt
table:columns.description: Date the GAP Status Code was assigned in YYYYMMDD or YYYY format.

table:columns.name: IUCN_Cat
table:columns.description: IUCN Protected Area Management Category: Ia, Ib, II, III, IV, V, or VI.

table:columns.name: IUCNCtSrc
table:columns.description: Source document used to assign the IUCN Category.

table:columns.name: IUCNCtDt
table:columns.description: Date the IUCN Category was assigned in YYYYMMDD or YYYY format.

table:columns.name: Date_Est
table:columns.description: Date the protected area was formally established.

table:columns.name: Comments
table:columns.description: Additional information, caveats, or notes about the protected area feature.

table:columns.name: SHAPE_Length
table:columns.description: Perimeter length in meters (original CRS). Recalculate in appropriate CRS for analysis.

table:columns.name: SHAPE_Area
table:columns.description: Area in square meters (original CRS). Use GIS_Acres for area comparisons.

table:columns.name: SHAPE
table:columns.description: Geometry in WKB format, EPSG:4326 (WGS84). Typically MULTIPOLYGON.

table:columns.name: bbox
table:columns.type: struct<xmin: double, ymin: double, xmax: double, ymax: double>
table:columns.description: Bounding box in EPSG:4326. Useful for spatial indexing.
